name: Realitris
description:
Defeat the fiendish Infitium, and bring order to the timeline.
Play through 5 rip-roaring levels on your way to victory.

Score  Points by clearing rows. Use time to your advantage to beat the level score of 15,000 points.

How to Play

Instructions on how to play can be found within the game.

Platforms

Runs on Windows only

Other

There is an issue with some installs where the sound is distored, if this is the case enter the options menu and change the sound level and click save.
